snippet.title: Imagine Fashion Designer Trailer | North America
snippet.description: Imagine, the original Games for Girls brand, is introducing the most realistic and customizable fashion design game yet for the Nintendo 3DS™ system that allows you to create whatever you dream. In Imagine Fashion Designer, players chart their own path to becoming a world famous fashion designer by creating the most unique and lifelike 3D looks, developing the wardrobe of their dreams and sharing creations with friends. Imagine Fashion Designer fully leverages the Nintendo 3DS system's features, with almost-touchable 3D designs and textures, StreetPass™ sharing, 3D camera captures and more.
